snippet: If an amazing technology, with enormous profit potential, breaks through in 2028, the International Olympic Committee would not reopen talks to seek additional money from NBC.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that NBC's $7.75 billion deal for exclusive rights to the six Olympic Games from 2022 to 2032 covers any and all new technology that might develop in the next two decades.
lead_paragraph: If an amazing technology, with enormous profit potential, breaks through in 2028, the International Olympic Committee would not reopen talks to seek additional money from NBC.

headline.seo: NBC’s Olympic TV Deal Accounts for Advances in Technology
headline.main: All the Way to 2032, Come What May
headline.print_headline: All the Way to 2032, Come What May
